findings.title: Multiplication after division
findings.description: Performing multiplication operation after division can cause rounding errors and increase dramatically if division is done before multiplication.

findings.title: Linting violations
findings.description: There are multiple linting violations within the contract, it is recommended to use solhint to fix them.

findings.title: Pragma versions not locked
findings.description: The Pragma version is not locked to a specific version and allows old or recent versions which can cause security issues.

findings.title: Use local variable instead of state variable
findings.description: State variable .length of non-memory array is used in the condition of for loop at multiple occurrences. In this case, every iteration of the loop consumes extra gas. If the state variable .length is used several times, holding its value in a local variable is more gas efficient.

findings.title: Be explicit about which `uint` the code is using
Minting of batch of children ERC1155 tokens fails when any token id does not exist
findings.description: The contract fails to mint a batch of child ERC1155 tokens if any token ID in the array does not exist.

findings.title: Contract fails to deploy with incorrect list of arguments
findings.description: The contract does not deploy when passed an incorrect list of arguments.

findings.title: Single child ERC1155 token cannot be created when sender does not have a minter role
findings.description: The contract prevents creation of a single child ERC1155 token if the sender lacks the minter role.

findings.title: Uri gets generated after successfully creating a strand
findings.description: Test if uri gets generated after successfully creating a strand

findings.title: Multiple strands get created when sender has minter role
findings.description: When a sender has the minter role, multiple strands are created.

findings.title: Uris gets generated after successfully creating a batch of strands
findings.description: Test if uris gets generated after successfully creating a batch of strands

findings.title: Single ERC721 garment parent token get generated without linked child tokens and when sender has minter role
findings.description: A single ERC721 garment parent token can be generated without being linked to child tokens despite the sender having the minter role.

findings.title: Single ERC721 garment parent token cannot be generated when sender does not have minter role
findings.description: The mintParentWithChildren function fails to generate a single ERC721 garment parent token if the sender lacks the minter role.

findings.title: Single ERC721 garment parent token cannot be generated when an array of strand uris are not passed properly
findings.description: The minting of a single ERC721 garment parent token fails when an array of strand URIs is not provided correctly.
